# resumeButton

**Instance Property**

The appearance of the resume button.

## Declaration

```swift
var resumeButton: AlarmButton
```

## Creating a resume button

- **init(title:resumeButton:)**: Creates a pause presentation with a resume button.
- **title**: The title of the paused UI.
